attr.attrdef: Given year's heavy commercial annual average daily traffic (HCAADT).
Feature geometry.
Route naming field where I=Interstate Highway, TH=Trunk Highway, CSAH=County State Aid Highway, CR=County Road, MSAS=Municipal State Aid Street
Route system field where 01=Interstate Highway, 02=US Highway, 03= State Highway, 04=County State Aid Highway, 07=County Road, 05=Municipal State Aid Street
Roadway route number

The unique identifier for the entire route within the state, using the following format: RRJJJJNNNNA where, RR = Route_System, JJJJ = Jurisdiction, defined as below based on Route_System (01, 02, 03 = 0000; 05, 10 = City Census Code; All others = XX00 where XX is XX = TIS County Code), NNNN = Route Number padded with leading zeros, and A = Alpha code on the end of particular routes or blank if none is present.
A unique number that identifies the traffic segment
Description of the location on a traffic segment where a count was taken
Vehicle Class site number
Year of most recent heavy commercial annual average daily traffic (HCAADT).

citeinfo.origin: Minnesota Department of Transportation/Office of Transportation Systems Management/Traffic Forecasting and Analysis Section
citeinfo.title: Heavy Commercial Annual Average Daily Traffic Segments, Minnesota, 1994-2012

pubinfo.publish: Minnesota Department of Transportation/Office of Transportation Systems Management/Traffic Forecasting and Analysis Section

descript.abstract: HCAADT is the theoretical estimate of the total number of heavy commercial vehicles using a specific segment of roadway (in both directions) on any given day of the year. This estimate represents the total number of heavy commercial vehicles per year divided by 365 and is developed using factors to adjust for season on sampled road systems in a particular given year. This information is displayed using the road centerlines within the state. This centerline layer is a subset of the State of Minnesota BaseMap which consists of a number of individual data layers originally digitized from USGS 7.5-minute quadrangles, but later updated via aerial imagery and local input.
descript.purpose: Determine general estimates of location-specific, heavy commercial annual average daily traffic (HCAADT) on the entire trunk highway system every year. More information about the Traffic Volume and the Vehicle Classification Program can be found at: http://www.dot.state.mn.us/traffic/data/

citeinfo.title: Heavy Commercial Annual Average Daily Traffic Count Locations Annual Average Daily Traffic Current Traffic Segments Annual Average Daily Traffic 1992-2013 Count Locations

timeperd.current: Data is provided for the following years: 1994, 1996, 1998, 2000, 2002, 2004, and 2006-2012.

theme.themekey: Transportation, HCAADT, Heavy Commercial, Truck Counts, Traffic Counts, Traffic Volumes

idinfo.useconst: Planning level use only, not to be used for design purposes

attracc.attraccr: 2013 data was found to have a systemic error so is no longer distributed. 2012 data should be used instead.
